an3.83:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati paṭikacceva khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ.
an3.83:4.4: Paṭikacceva khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ kālena bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
an3.83:4.5: Kālena bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā samayena udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi.
an3.83:4.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
an3.83:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tīṇimāni bhikkhussa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
an3.83:5.4: imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bhikkhussa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
an3.83:6.2: ‘tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisīlasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāne’ti.
